subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Once the Yankees acquired Aaron Hicks, it became clear that as long as they had four outfielders, Young was headed elsewhere, no matter how effusively Brian Cashman praised him.
snippet: Once the Yankees acquired Aaron Hicks, it became clear that as long as they had four outfielders, Young was headed elsewhere, no matter how effusively Brian Cashman praised him.
